title: Group Reflection Project Based on the Six Thinking Hats Model for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Instructional Design Knowledge and Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: A mathematics education design project conducted in BYOD environments, providing continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct systematic reflective dialogues with peers at over 80% participation by utilizing the functions of each hat in the Six Thinking Hats model.
Learners can establish a plan to evaluate and improve the project design process, focusing on the coordination role of the Blue Hat.
Learners can propose three or more specific action strategies to resolve issues identified during group reflection processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
